attributes.action: stop paying for excessive MP travel expences out of tax payers money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unlike the rest of the EU, the UK is the only country which pays it's MPs travel expenses out of taxpayer pounds.  The expensive cars and Unnecessary opulance wastes an unbelievable amount of our hard earned cash, that could be used to fund our education and nhs systems.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
